name: Inglorious Waifu VS Nazi Zombies
description:
Inglorious Waifu VS Nazi Zombies is a Third person Shooter Game.
The action takes place in Normandy when the allied forces arrive in France during the Second World War.

You must fight nazi zombies, and take down the Fuhrer Hitler himself to end this war.
15 levels are waiting for you to complete your goal.

  • A Gunswap game mode
  • 15 Levels with many objectives
  • Zombie enemies with varied fighting styles
  • The Sexy Camera widget is always present
  • 5+ Emotes Anime / Manga Style
  • Multiple guns, sniper, rifle, rocket launcher, and automatic weapons with different fire rate
  • Great anime Graphics
